ItemTemplate.Name: ASP.NET Scaffolding T4 files.
ItemTemplate.Description: You can install these templates into your project to customize the files generated by the ASP.NET New Scaffolded Item dialog. Once you install these files into a project they will override the standard files used when the scaffolders are invoked.

ItemTemplate.Description: Enables automatic package restore before build to be used on build server. To be used in favor of the MSBuild-Integrated package restore.

ItemTemplate.Description: This will create the .vstemplate- files that are needed for SideWaffle Item Templates and Project Templates.

ItemTemplate.Name: SideWaffle Item Template
ItemTemplate.Description: This will create a folder with the name that you specify as the file name below. In that folder you will have all the files you need for a SideWaffle Item Template.

ItemTemplate.Name: SideWaffle Project Template Files
ItemTemplate.Description: This will add the files required to create a project template using SideWaffle. The files that will be added include; _preprocess.xml, _Definitions\_project.vstemplate.xml and file-icon.png.

ItemTemplate.Name: Web API 2 Empty Controller
ItemTemplate.Description: This template creates an empty Web API controller, along with the supporting files needed (routing, global.asax). The output from this is inspired by the article by Joe Binder (MSFT). This is focused for Visual Studio LightSwitch HTML SERVER projects.

Snippet.Title: Angular Controller
Snippet.Description: Template for adding an Angular Controller

Snippet.Title: Angular Directive
Snippet.Description: Template for adding an Angular Directive

Snippet.Title: Angular Service
Snippet.Description: Template for adding an Angular Service

Snippet.Title: Nancy - Delete
Snippet.Description: Adds a Delete endpoint to a module

Snippet.Title: Nancy - Get
Snippet.Description: Adds a Get endpoint to a module

Snippet.Title: Dispose
Snippet.Description: Implements the dispose pattern correctly for an object - you still need to add the IDisposable interface to the type defination.

Snippet.Title: Nancy - Head
Snippet.Description: Adds a Head endpoint to a module

Snippet.Title: Nancy - Options
Snippet.Description: Adds a Options endpoint to a module

Snippet.Title: Nancy - Patch
Snippet.Description: Adds a Patch endpoint to a module

Snippet.Title: Nancy - Post
Snippet.Description: Adds a Post endpoint to a module

Snippet.Title: Nancy - Put
Snippet.Description: Adds a Put endpoint to a module

Snippet.Title: WCF Client Usage
Snippet.Description: Implements the pattern correctly for a WCF client to correctly deal with the closing, disposing & errors on a proxie. For further info see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa355056.aspx
